1.Step 1 - Bismillah: BEFORE WUDU’: Intention of making wudu’ should  be done in the heart, then say: Bismillah (In the name of Allah) ِللها  ِم ْسِب

2.Step 2 - Hands: Repeat 3 Times Completely wash the  hands, including the  wrists and between the  fingers

3.Step 3 - Mouth: Repeat 3 Times Rinse the mouth. Using the right hand  put a small amount of water into the  mouth, swirl around, then expel.

4.Step 4 - Nose: Repeat 3 Times Sniff water into the nostrils as far  as possible with the right hand, and  then sniff it out with left hand.

5.Step 5 - Face: Repeat 3 Times Wash the face from forehead  to chin, left earlobe to the right  earlobe making sure the whole  face is washed.

6.Step 6 - Arms: Repeat 3 Times Wash the two arms up to and including  the elbows, hand and between the  fingers. Begin with the right arm.

9.Step 9 – Feet: BEFORE WUDU’: Intention of making wudu’ should  be done in the heart, then say: Bismillah (In the name of Allah)

10.Step 10 - Closing Du’a/Invocation: AFTER WUDU’: Say: Ash-hadu anllaa ilaaha illallaah wa ash-hadu  anna Muhammadan ‘abduhu wa rasooluh (I bear witness that there is no God worthy of worship  except Allah. And I bear witness that Muhammad is His  slave and Messenger.) ُلو س ر و هُدْب

Step 7 - Head: Wipe the head with wet fingers
starting at the fringe to the back
hairline and back the same way all

Step 8 – Ears: both ears with index finger, and the
back of the ears with the thumbs
